parameter.name: name
parameter.label: Connection name
parameter.description: A connection name helps to identify a broker connection. If nothing is set, an automatic name based on the host and port will be generated.

parameter.name: host
parameter.label: Broker host
parameter.description: Hostname or IP of the broker

parameter.name: port
parameter.label: Broker port
parameter.description: A custom broker connection port. Leave empty to use the default Mqtt ports for secure or non-secure connections

parameter.name: secure
parameter.label: Secure connection?
parameter.description: A broker connection is either a non-secure tcp connection or a tls secure connection

parameter.name: clientID
parameter.label: Client ID
parameter.description: An optional client ID used for this connection

parameter.name: keepAlive
parameter.label: Keep-alive (sec)
parameter.description: Keep-alive timer in seconds. A too frequent timer could conquest the network / spam the Mqtt server, a too low value might risk that a broken connection is detected very late.

parameter.name: qos
parameter.label: Quality of service
parameter.description: The Quality of Service (QoS) level is an agreement between sender and receiver of a message regarding the guarantees of delivering a message.

options.option: At most once (best effort delivery "fire and forget")
At least once (guaranteed that a message will be delivered at least once)
Exactly once (guarantees that each message is received only once by the counterpart)

parameter.name: retainMessages
parameter.label: Retain messages
parameter.description: Messages send by this connection are retained

parameter.name: lwtTopic
parameter.label: Last will topic
parameter.description: When the connection dies, the last will is performed by the Mqtt server. This is the last-will topic. It must be set to perform a last-will.

parameter.name: lwtMessage
parameter.label: Last will message
parameter.description: When the connection dies, the last will is performed by the Mqtt server. This is the last-will message. Can be empty.

parameter.name: lwtQos
parameter.label: Last will quality of service
parameter.description: The Quality of Service (QoS) level is an agreement between sender and receiver of a message regarding the guarantees of delivering a message.

options.option: At most once (best effort delivery "fire and forget")
At least once (guaranteed that a message will be delivered at least once)
Exactly once (guarantees that each message is received only once by the counterpart)

parameter.name: lwtRetain
parameter.label: Last will retain message
parameter.description: When the connection dies, the last will is performed by the Mqtt server. If retain message is checked, the message will be retained by the Mqtt server.
